item.description: The 15-year-old chipmaker saw its shares climb 61% above its IPO price by the close of its first trading day.

item.description: The disease has claimed the lives of 12 people in the country this year, with the virus continuing to spread rapidly.

item.title: GitHub Copilot crosses 20 million all-time users
item.description: One of the most popular AI coding tools on the market added five million users in the last three months.
